text: The Quiller Memorandum is a 1966 American British spy drama movie directed by Michael Anderson and based on the 1965 novel The Berlin Memorandum by Elleston Trevor. It stars George Segal, Alec Guinness, Max von Sydow, Senta Berger, George Sanders, Philip Madoc and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 3 BAFTAS in 1967. ==Other websites== * * Category:1960s spy movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:American spy movies Category:American drama movies Category:British spy movies Category:1960s British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Anderson
title: The Quiller Memorandum
